Package personal.gym.service

Class ListServices

java.lang.Object
personal.gym.service.ListServices
public class ListServices
extends java.lang.Object
Data structure and a secondary controller of the app. Serves as a controller for ListSessions. This list serves as the contractual engagement between #GYM and its professionals. Can also be interpreted as the master schedule for #GYM's service offering. On a functional level, this class is used to generate and modify ListSessions.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yu Deng, Philippe Gabriel, Julien Thibeault, Yan Zhuang

    • getService

      public Service getService​(java.lang.String serviceNo)
      Retrieves the service associated with the given service number or null if no service associated.
      Parameters:
      serviceNo - Service number
      Returns:
      Associated service or null if no number associated

    • createService

      public Service createService​(java.lang.String name, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, Day[] occurrences, int capacityMax, java.lang.String comment, int fee, java.util.Date serviceTime, java.lang.String profNo) throws java.text.ParseException, InvalidFormatException
      Creates a new service and adds it onto list of services. Also generates the appropriate sessions.
      Parameters:
      name - Service name
      startDate - Service start date
      endDate - Service end date
      occurrences - Service weekly recurrence
      capacityMax - Service maximum capacity
      comment - Service comment
      fee - Service fee
      serviceTime - Service time
      profNo - Service professional's number
      Returns:
      Created service
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - if a parsing error occurs
      InvalidFormatException - if any of the provided attributes does not respect the imposed format

    • modifyService

      public void modifyService​(Service service, java.lang.String name, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, Day[] occurrences, int capacityMax, java.lang.String comment, int fee, java.util.Date serviceTime, java.lang.String profNo) throws InvalidFormatException, java.text.ParseException
      Modifies information relative to a service. Also updates existing sessions if affected.
      Parameters:
      service - Service to modify
      name - Modified Service name
      startDate - Modified Service start date
      endDate - Modified Service end date
      occurrences - Modified Service weekly recurrence
      capacityMax - Modified Service maximum capacity
      comment - Modified Service comment
      fee - Modified Service fee
      serviceTime - Modified Service time
      profNo - Modified Service professional's number
      Throws:
      InvalidFormatException - if any of the provided attributes does not respect the imposed format
      java.text.ParseException - if a parse error occurs

    • deleteService

      public Service deleteService​(java.lang.String serviceNo)
      Deletes an existing service if no active validations currently exist. Also deletes the service's associated sessions.
      Parameters:
      serviceNo - Service number
      Returns:
      Deleted service or null if none deleted

    • deleteServicesProf

      public void deleteServicesProf​(java.lang.String profNo)
      Deletes all services under a professional who is quitting the #GYM facility. Also deletes the existing sessions under that professional.
      Parameters:
      profNo - Professional number
